title: Bill
creator_credit: Alan Landsburg Productions, Mel Stuart and Anthony Page
brief_description: Bill, a 40 year old intellectually disabled man, must learn to survive the harsh realities of New York City or be recommitted to an institution for the rest of his life. He can neither read nor write and his child-like gentleness and innocence make him an easy target for hurt or rejection.
creator_credit_for_label: Alan Landsburg Productions, Mel Stuart and Anthony Page
